attributes.action: Remove the current EU ledership of JC Junkers and Donald Tusk
attributes.additional_details: Manipulation and Blackmail of the Greek and Portuguese Parliaments
attributes.background: The current  EU leadership has pushed ahead with ever closer union at the expense of seeking policies that can alleviate the pain of millions across the EU particularly the young. They have focused exclusively at avoiding precedent rather than healing rifts. They are remote and not fit for the job
